alternative_parents.description: Keto acids with an alkyl chain the contains less than 6 carbon atoms.
alternative_parents.name: Short-chain keto acids and derivatives

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing exactly two carboxylic acid groups.
alternative_parents.name: Dicarboxylic acids and derivatives

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing an aldehyde substituted with a keto group on the adjacent carbon.
alternative_parents.name: Alpha-keto acids and derivatives

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing a carboxylic acid, and an amine group attached to the alpha carbon atom, relative to the C=O group.
alternative_parents.name: Alpha-hydroxy ketones

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a carboxylic acid group with the formula -C(=O)OH.
alternative_parents.name: Carboxylic acids

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing an oxide group.
alternative_parents.name: Organic oxides

alternative_parents.description: Derivatives of hydrocarbons obtained by substituting one or more carbon atoms by an heteroatom. They contain at least one carbon atom and heteroatom.
alternative_parents.name: Hydrocarbon derivatives

class.description: Organic compounds containing a ketone group and a carboxylic acid group.
class.name: Keto acids and derivatives

description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as gamma-keto acids and derivatives. These are organic compounds containing an aldehyde substituted with a keto group on the C4 carbon atom.

direct_parent.description: Organic compounds containing an aldehyde substituted with a keto group on the C4 carbon atom.
direct_parent.name: Gamma-keto acids and derivatives

kingdom.description: Compounds that contain at least one carbon atom, excluding isocyanide/cyanide and their non-hydrocarbyl derivatives, thiophosgene, carbon diselenide, carbon monosulfide, carbon disulfide, carbon subsulfide, carbon monoxide, carbon dioxide, Carbon suboxide, and dicarbon monoxide.
kingdom.name: Organic compounds

subclass.description: Organic compounds containing an aldehyde substituted with a keto group on the C4 carbon atom.
subclass.name: Gamma-keto acids and derivatives

superclass.description: Compounds an organic acid or a derivative thereof.
superclass.name: Organic acids and derivatives
